name: Escape The Rewind
description:
Escape the Rewind is a fun little platformer with inspiration from games like Super Mario Bros and Super Meat Boy. This game was made for a 2 week game jam called "Summer FlowJam 2020" by JR 01 and Baron Wasteland.

Since the Jam, I spent some time updating the movements, graphics, and settings to where I'm comfortable enough to show on Itch. I hope you enjoy the challenge!

Contributions:

This game was made using Flowlab.io

All the art is made Baron Wasteland

Music is by Eric Matyas from soundimage.org
